website_summaries.verdict: A very sturdy option for mounting on boats or other surfaces, even coolers.
pros: Comes in a choice of white or black
Holder also comes with built-in areas to hold a knife, pliers, and lures
cons: While good for spinning reels, bait casters don't fit into the slots in the tubes

customer_reviews.title: Sea Dog 325038-1 Three Pole Side-Mount Rod Holder, White
customer_reviews.text: Sea Dog 325038-1 Three Pole Side-Mount Rod Holder, White This order is for my Kayak or my boat, which ever I put it on. It's OK and I like it for the price, $14.34 was not too high and lower than the black version. I do plan to mount it on milk cartons as do all kayakers. I have a pole light that will sit with a flag and led light on top, I made, to take up the middle position. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: CDP's Onceagain habit of purchasingTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Can be made to be portable.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Our pontoon is mostly a pleasure craft and not designed for fishing. E.G. no rod holders, seats facing backwards, live well, etc. However, I do use it on occasion for fishing so wanted the rod holders. My wife was against permanently attaching these, and I was on board with that due to the low use. Thus I came up with a removable design using this product, Taylor Made Pontoon Boat Rail Fender Hanger/Adjusters (also bought on Amazon), and some stainless machine screws. Made two of them. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Good solid pole holder. Mounted it in about 15 minutes with the enclosed screws. Now I keep 3 poles next to the helm of my bass boat for immediate access with no tangled lines. Good value at a budget price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Rod holder itself is great, but the provided hardware is not sufficient to ...
customer_reviews.text: Rod holder itself is great, but the provided hardware is not sufficient to secure it to the cooler when loaded up with rods. The rod holder ripped off my cooler on the water. I will be replacing the screws with nuts/bolts.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Easily fastened to gunnel of my aluminum boat using two of the four provided SS screws using a 1/8 drill bit in my drill. Needs a #2 phillips screwdriver to install. Handy for poles and nets.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS PARKHILL

customer_reviews.title: Ready to fish
customer_reviews.text: This rod rack is very nice, it was easy to mount and very strong. I will be getting a couple more and replacing other ones on the boat. a great buy and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband to put in his new boat. It was easy to install and very sturdy. He has his fishing rods lined up and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: katie w

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good quality get creative with it
customer_reviews.text: I got creative and ziptied this to a milk crate and use it as a pole holder for surf fishing. My buddies laugh and then have to hold their pole in their hand while mine hands are free!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Matches mounting holes of similar AFI brand triple rod holder
customer_reviews.text: The screw hole pattern for this rod holder is identical to the hole pattern of a similar rod holder from AFI (AFI embossed on the front of the rod holder.) No additional drilling required. We're averse to drilling fiberglass boats full of holes, so finding the perfect match pleased us much.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: It works great! Very easy to install onto our boat
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my 16' foot Glastron boat. It works great! Very easy to install onto our boat, we hooked it to the back of the boat, it keeps the poles out of the way but still easily accessible. Great buy for anyone with a boat!!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Great place to protect rods from kids feet
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy vertical rod storage while out on the water, I have a 4 year old and it is imperative that I keep my rods off the floor in my boat, this made that problem go away instantly. Super easy to install, and fairly heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: claw

customer_reviews.title: Solid Rod Holder
customer_reviews.text: Installed on the back if a golf cart. This is made better , Thicker, than another one i ordered on clearance from Bass pro.
customer_reviews.author: ECUPirate

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for our canoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband was pleased with the pole holders and the extra space for pliers and knives. It arrived very quickly and we would recommend this item. Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Patti D

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, well constructed and heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice heavy duty rod holder. Made from a thick composite material, it holds up well to weekly use. I attached one of these to my fold up portable wagon to hold my fishing rods and net when I take the 20 minute walk to my fishing spot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: If you are thinking about it do it
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this price, quality rod holders mounted to a custom rack and i love them
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: As described and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Was replacement for one which had broken on our pontoon. Delivered promptly and easy to install. Totally satisfied with product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Good as any plastic holders
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for 30 bucks added to the transom divider for extra rod storage and so I could trailer boat with them stored lower. My 7ft rods are just below the hardtop so no limbs with snag them. They are strong as you could hope for something not metal. Good value. I’m buying another for fishing WaveRunner project.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I attach this to my kayak crate and it worked great. Has been in the ocean several times without any problems. Much cheaper than anything found elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pole mount
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pole mounts to attach to my cooler on my kayak. Now, I can carry my poles along with my cooler.
customer_reviews.author: John Carver

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love them and the price they fit well had all the hardware to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan K Farnworth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit perfect design we love it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased just to put on the golf cart at the cabin to transport Our fishing rods to the dock, Perfect fit perfect design we love it

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Mounted 2 in my garage for rod and reel storage. Heavy plastic and fasteners work good.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this to mount inside my 12ft flat bottom so I had more space for rods and to keep them outta my way for fishing worked out great couldn't be happier with it

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item!
customer_reviews.text: Great item for fishing, I tie this onto my fishing cart and instantly have 3 pole holder for fishing rods.

customer_reviews.title: Used to cost less
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Very sturdy and nicer than the ones from the local shop. Alas the price has doubled here on amazon so I will be buying locally next time I need some.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Good price, well made for the money and ideal for my needs.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old rod holders on my boat. Old ones were 2, these are 3. Room for 2 extra rods! 😂

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I hoped! holds 3 rods, and tools. great mount
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ross

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy and I like the slots for hooks and lures and the slot for a pair of players. The only down side is the holders are a bit too close together. Reels tend to knock into each other.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to mount to front tag bracket then mounted tag to rod holder.

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: Strapped it to a hitch mounted cargo carrier for use with my Jeep. Used it during a trip on the highway. Worked wonderfully.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: These work great on the underside of my pickup topper for holding ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great on the underside of my pickup topper for holding spinning rods. I put Velcro around them to hold the rods in place and they don’t move.

customer_reviews.title: Great and cheap, if it lasts in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap and looks great. Will be great if it lasts in the sun.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy rod holders
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and keeps my rods and reels secured and out of the way while fishing.

customer_reviews.text: work for rod holders in my garage and good price

customer_reviews.title: This three pole mount is GREAT VALUE for the money
customer_reviews.text: This three pole mount is GREAT VALUE for the money. This plastic is heavy duty and installed easily in minutes!!

customer_reviews.text: Helps organize poles and other fishing gear like fish net in the boat. Was easy to install and fit the limited space in the boat.

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I used it to hold two poles and ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this rod mount in a 12 foot john boat. It works great. I used it to hold two poles and my fish net. Great price and easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good
customer_reviews.text: Good all around, but for a milk crate, a little tricky.

customer_reviews.text: These holders are very sturdy and work well for my spinning rods. I bought longer bolts and washers and locking nuts, and attached it to a milk crate for my kayak.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Sea Dog Line - 3004.613 Wall MNT Rod/Tool Holder 3 WHT
product_meta.description: Three Pole Rod Holder is one piece, no assembly required. Built-in knife, pliers and lure holder. Sea-Dog Line is a 3rd generation family company with a history of satisfied customers stretching back to the company's start in 1933. The company is the recipient of multiple industry awards for quality and efficiency.
feature_bullets: Installs with four #8 fasteners (only included in display packaging)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
